segments.source_content: # Introduction

translations.zh-CN: # 简介

segments.source_content: ⚡️ Docusaurus will help you ship a **beautiful documentation site in no time**.

translations.zh-CN: ⚡️ Docusaurus 能助您**快速搭建精美的文档网站**。

segments.source_content: 💸 Building a custom tech stack is expensive. Instead, **focus on your content** and just write Markdown files.

translations.zh-CN: 💸 构建自定义技术栈成本高昂。不如**专注于您的内容**，只需编写 Markdown 文件即可。

segments.source_content: 💥 Ready for more? Use **advanced features** like versioning, i18n, search and theme customizations.

translations.zh-CN: 💥 想要更多功能？可使用**高级特性**如版本控制、国际化、搜索和主题定制。

segments.source_content: 💅 Check the **[best Docusaurus sites](/showcase?tags=favorite)** for inspiration and read some **[testimonials](https://x.com/sebastienlorber/timelines/1392048416872706049)**.

translations.zh-CN: 💅 查看**[最佳 Docusaurus 网站案例](/showcase?tags=favorite)**获取灵感，或阅读一些**[用户评价](https://x.com/sebastienlorber/timelines/1392048416872706049)**。

segments.source_content: 🧐 Docusaurus is a **static-site generator**. It builds a **single-page application** with fast client-side navigation, leveraging the full power of **React** to make your site interactive. It provides out-of-the-box **documentation features** but can be used to create **any kind of site** (personal website, product, blog, marketing landing pages, etc).

translations.zh-CN: 🧐 Docusaurus 是一个**静态网站生成器**。它构建了**单页应用程序**，通过快速的客户端导航，充分利用 **React** 的交互能力。它提供开箱即用的**文档功能**，但也可用于创建**任何类型的网站**（个人网站、产品、博客、营销落地页等）。

segments.source_content: ## Migrating from v1 {#migrating-from-v1}

translations.zh-CN: ## 从 v1 迁移 {#migrating-from-v1}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v2+ has been a total rewrite from Docusaurus v1, taking advantage of a completely modernized toolchain. After [v2's official release](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0), we highly encourage you to **use Docusaurus v2+ over Docusaurus v1**, as Docusaurus v1 has been deprecated.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v2+ 是对 Docusaurus v1 的彻底重写，采用了完全现代化的工具链。在 [v2 正式发布](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2022/08/01/announcing-docusaurus-2.0) 后，我们强烈建议您**使用 Docusaurus v2+ 而非 Docusaurus v1**，因为 Docusaurus v1 已被弃用。

segments.source_content: A [lot of users](/showcase) are already using Docusaurus v2+ ([trends](https://www.npmtrends.com/docusaurus-vs-@docusaurus/core)).

translations.zh-CN: 已有[大量用户](/showcase)在使用 Docusaurus v2+（[趋势](https://www.npmtrends.com/docusaurus-vs-@docusaurus/core)）。

segments.source_content: **Use Docusaurus v2+ if:**

translations.zh-CN: **以下情况请使用 Docusaurus v2+：**

segments.source_content:
- :white_check_mark: You want a modern Jamstack documentation site
- :white_check_mark: You want a single-page application (SPA) with client-side routing
- :white_check_mark: You want the full power of React and MDX
- :white_check_mark: You do not need support for IE11

translations.zh-CN:
- :white_check_mark: 您需要一个现代化的 Jamstack 文档网站
- :white_check_mark: 您需要具有客户端路由的单页应用 (SPA)
- :white_check_mark: 您希望充分利用 React 和 MDX 的全部功能
- :white_check_mark: 您不需要支持 IE11

segments.source_content: **Use [Docusaurus v1](https://v1.docusaurus.io/) if:**

translations.zh-CN: **以下情况请使用 [Docusaurus v1](https://v1.docusaurus.io/)：**

segments.source_content:
- :x: You don't want a single-page application (SPA)
- :x: You need support for IE11 (...do you? IE [has already reached end-of-life](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/lifecycle/products/internet-explorer-11) and is no longer officially supported)

translations.zh-CN:
- :x: 您不需要单页应用 (SPA)
- :x: 您需要支持 IE11（...真的需要吗？IE [已终止支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/lifecycle/products/internet-explorer-11)，不再获得官方维护）

segments.source_content: For existing v1 users that are seeking to upgrade to v2+, you can follow our [migration guides](./migration/index.mdx).

translations.zh-CN: 对于现有希望升级至 v2+ 版本的 v1 用户，可遵循我们的[迁移指南](./migration/index.mdx)。

segments.source_content: ## Features {#features}

translations.zh-CN: ## 功能特性 {#features}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus is built with high attention to the developer and contributor experience.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 在开发者和贡献者体验方面倾注了高度关注。

segments.source_content:
- ⚛️ **Built with 💚 and React**:
  - Extend and customize with React
  - Gain full control of your site's browsing experience by providing your own React components
- **Pluggable**:
  - Bootstrap your site with a basic template, then use advanced features and plugins
  - Open source your plugins to share with the community
- ✂️ **Developer experience**:
  - Start writing your docs right now
  - Universal configuration entry point to make it more maintainable by contributors
  - Hot reloading with lightning-fast incremental build on changes
  - Route-based code and data splitting
  - Publish to GitHub Pages, Netlify, Vercel, and other deployment services with ease

translations.zh-CN:
- ⚛️ **基于 React 匠心构建**：
  - 使用 React 进行扩展和定制
  - 通过提供自定义 React 组件，全面掌控站点浏览体验
- **插件化架构**：
  - 通过基础模板快速建站，随后启用高级功能和插件
  - 将插件开源以与社区共享
- ✂️ **开发者体验优化**：
  - 即刻开始编写文档
  - 统一的配置入口点，便于贡献者维护
  - 支持热重载，变更时增量构建速度极快
  - 基于路由的代码和数据分割
  - 轻松部署至 GitHub Pages、Netlify、Vercel 等平台

segments.source_content: Our shared goal—to help your users quickly find what they need and understand your products better. We share our best practices to help you build your docs site right and well.

translations.zh-CN: 我们共同的目标——帮助用户快速找到所需内容并更好地理解您的产品。我们分享最佳实践，助您构建出色的文档站点。

segments.source_content:
- 🎯 **SEO friendly**:
  - HTML files are statically generated for every possible path.
  - Page-specific SEO to help your users land on your official docs directly relating their problems at hand.
- 📝 **Powered by MDX**:
  - Write interactive components via JSX and React embedded in Markdown.
  - Share your code in live editors to get your users to love your products on the spot.
- 🔍 **Search**: Your full site is searchable.
- 💾 **Document Versioning**: Helps you keep documentation in sync with project releases.
- 🌍 **Internationalization (i18n)**: Translate your site in multiple locales.

translations.zh-CN:
- 🎯 **SEO 友好**：
  - 为所有可能路径静态生成 HTML 文件
  - 页面专属 SEO 优化，让用户直接访问与其问题相关的官方文档
- 📝 **基于 MDX 驱动**：
  - 在 Markdown 中嵌入 JSX 和 React 编写交互式组件
  - 通过实时编辑器共享代码，让用户即刻爱上您的产品
- 🔍 **全站搜索**：支持全站内容检索
- 💾 **文档版本控制**：保持文档与项目版本同步
- 🌍 **国际化(i18n)**：支持多语言站点翻译

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v2+ is born to be compassionately accessible to all your users, and lightning-fast.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v2+ 天生具备极致的访问速度和普适的可访问性。

segments.source_content:
- ⚡️ **Lightning-fast**. Docusaurus v2+ follows the [PRPL Pattern](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/prpl-pattern/) that makes sure your content loads blazing fast.
- 🦖 **Accessible**. Attention to accessibility, making your site equally accessible to all users.

translations.zh-CN:
- ⚡️ **闪电般快速**。遵循 [PRPL 模式](https://developers.google.com/web/fundamentals/performance/prpl-pattern/)，确保内容加载如闪电
- 🦖 **无障碍设计**。注重可访问性，让所有用户平等获取信息

segments.source_content: ## Design principles {#design-principles}

translations.zh-CN: ## 设计原则 {#design-principles}

segments.source_content:
- **Little to learn**. Docusaurus should be easy to learn and use as the API is quite small. Most things will still be achievable by users, even if it takes them more code and more time to write. Not having abstractions is better than having the wrong abstractions, and we don't want users to have to hack around the wrong abstractions. Mandatory talk—[Minimal API Surface Area](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4anAwXYqLG8).
- **Intuitive**. Users will not feel overwhelmed when looking at the project directory of a Docusaurus project or adding new features. It should look intuitive and easy to build on top of, using approaches they are familiar with.
- **Layered architecture**. The separations of concerns between each layer of our stack (content/theming/styling) should be clear—well-abstracted and modular.
- **Sensible defaults**. Common and popular performance optimizations and configurations will be done for users but they are given the option to override them.
- **No vendor lock-in**. Users are not required to use the default plugins or CSS, although they are highly encouraged to. Certain core infrastructures like React Loadable and React Router cannot be swapped because we do default performance optimization on them, but not higher-level ones. Choice of Markdown engines, CSS frameworks, CSS methodology, and other architectures will be entirely up to users.

translations.zh-CN:
- **低学习成本**。Docusaurus API 精简易学，即使需要编写更多代码，用户也能实现大多数功能。宁可缺少抽象，也不提供错误抽象——推荐观看演讲《[最小化 API 表面积](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4anAwXYqLG8)》
- **符合直觉**。项目目录结构直观清晰，新增功能时用户不会感到无所适从，基于熟悉的方式即可轻松扩展
- **分层架构**。内容层/主题层/样式层关注点分离，抽象合理且模块化
- **明智的默认值**。自动实施常见性能优化和配置，同时保留覆盖选项
- **无供应商锁定**。鼓励但不强制使用默认插件或 CSS，用户可自由选择 Markdown 引擎、CSS 框架和方法论等架构

segments.source_content: We believe that, as developers, knowing how a library works helps us become better at using it. Hence we're dedicating effort to explaining the architecture and various components of Docusaurus with the hope that users reading it will gain a deeper understanding of the tool and be even more proficient in using it.

translations.zh-CN: 我们相信，了解库的工作原理能帮助开发者更好地使用它。因此我们着力阐释 Docusaurus 的架构与组件，希望用户能深入理解工具原理，从而更高效地运用。

segments.source_content: ## Comparison with other tools {#comparison-with-other-tools}

translations.zh-CN: ## 与其他工具对比 {#comparison-with-other-tools}

segments.source_content: Across all static site generators, Docusaurus has a unique focus on documentation sites and has many out-of-the-box features.

translations.zh-CN: 在所有静态站点生成器中，Docusaurus 独树一帜地专注于文档站点，并提供大量开箱即用的功能。

segments.source_content: We've also studied other main static site generators and would like to share our insights on the comparison, hopefully helping you navigate through the prismatic choices out there.

translations.zh-CN: 我们还研究了其他主流静态站点生成器，并希望分享我们的对比见解，帮助您在众多选择中找到最适合的方案。

segments.source_content: ### Gatsby {#gatsby}

translations.zh-CN: ### Gatsby {#gatsby}

segments.source_content: [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) is packed with a lot of features, has a rich ecosystem of plugins, and is capable of doing everything that Docusaurus does. Naturally, that comes at a cost of a higher learning curve. Gatsby does many things well and is suitable for building many types of websites. On the other hand, Docusaurus tries to do one thing super well - be the best tool for writing and publishing content.

translations.zh-CN: [Gatsby](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/)功能丰富，拥有庞大的插件生态系统，能够实现Docusaurus的所有功能。但相应地，其学习曲线更为陡峭。Gatsby擅长构建各类网站，而Docusaurus则专注于将一件事做到极致——成为编写和发布内容的最佳工具。

segments.source_content: GraphQL is also pretty core to Gatsby, although you don't necessarily need GraphQL to build a Gatsby site. In most cases when building static websites, you won't need the flexibility that GraphQL provides.

translations.zh-CN: GraphQL是Gatsby的核心技术，但构建静态网站时通常不需要GraphQL提供的灵活性。

segments.source_content: Many aspects of Docusaurus v2+ were inspired by the best things about Gatsby and it's a great alternative.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v2+的许多设计灵感源自Gatsby的优点，它是个出色的替代方案。

segments.source_content: [Docz](https://github.com/pedronauck/docz) is a Gatsby theme to build documentation websites. It is currently less featured than Docusaurus.

translations.zh-CN: [Docz](https://github.com/pedronauck/docz)是基于Gatsby的主题，用于构建文档网站。其功能目前不如Docusaurus全面。

segments.source_content: ### Next.js {#nextjs}

translations.zh-CN: ### Next.js {#nextjs}

segments.source_content: [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) is another very popular hybrid React framework. It can help you build a good documentation website, but it is not opinionated toward the documentation use-case, and it will require a lot more work to implement what Docusaurus provides out-of-the-box.

translations.zh-CN: [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/)是另一个流行的混合React框架。虽然能构建文档网站，但缺乏对文档场景的针对性设计，实现Docusaurus开箱即用的功能需要更多工作量。

segments.source_content: [Nextra](https://github.com/shuding/nextra) is an opinionated static site generator built on top of Next.js. It is currently less featured than Docusaurus.

translations.zh-CN: [Nextra](https://github.com/shuding/nextra)是基于Next.js的静态站点生成器，其功能目前不如Docusaurus完善。

segments.source_content: ### VitePress {#vitepress}

translations.zh-CN: ### VitePress {#vitepress}

segments.source_content: [VitePress](https://vitepress.dev/) has many similarities with Docusaurus - both focus heavily on content-centric websites and provides tailored documentation features out of the box. However, VitePress is powered by Vue, while Docusaurus is powered by React. If you want a Vue-based solution, VitePress would be a decent choice.

translations.zh-CN: [VitePress](https://vitepress.dev/)与Docusaurus有许多相似之处——都专注于内容型网站并提供开箱即用的文档功能。区别在于VitePress基于Vue，而Docusaurus基于React。如需Vue解决方案，VitePress是不错的选择。

segments.source_content: ### MkDocs {#mkdocs}

translations.zh-CN: ### MkDocs {#mkdocs}

segments.source_content: [MkDocs](https://www.mkdocs.org/) is a popular Python static site generator with value propositions similar to Docusaurus.

translations.zh-CN: [MkDocs](https://www.mkdocs.org/)是流行的Python静态站点生成器，定位与Docusaurus相似。

segments.source_content: It is a good option if you don't need a single-page application and don't plan to leverage React.

translations.zh-CN: 如果您不需要单页应用且不计划使用React，这是个好选择。

segments.source_content: [Material for MkDocs](https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/) is a beautiful theme.

translations.zh-CN: [Material for MkDocs](https://squidfunk.github.io/mkdocs-material/)是个精美的主题。

segments.source_content: ### Docsify {#docsify}

translations.zh-CN: ### Docsify {#docsify}

segments.source_content: [Docsify](https://docsify.js.org/) makes it easy to create a documentation website, but is not a static-site generator and is not SEO friendly.

translations.zh-CN: [Docsify](https://docsify.js.org/)易于创建文档网站，但非静态生成且对SEO不友好。

segments.source_content: ### GitBook {#gitbook}

translations.zh-CN: ### GitBook {#gitbook}

segments.source_content: [GitBook](https://www.gitbook.com/) has a very clean design and has been used by many open source projects. With its focus shifting towards a commercial product rather than an open-source tool, many of its requirements no longer fit the needs of open source projects' documentation sites. As a result, many have turned to other products. You may read about Redux's switch to Docusaurus [here](https://github.com/reduxjs/redux/issues/3161).

translations.zh-CN: [GitBook](https://www.gitbook.com/)设计简洁，曾被众多开源项目使用。随着其转向商业化产品，许多功能已不再符合开源文档需求。如Redux迁移至Docusaurus的[案例](https://github.com/reduxjs/redux/issues/3161)所示。

segments.source_content: Currently, GitBook is only free for open-source and non-profit teams. Docusaurus is free for everyone.

translations.zh-CN: 目前GitBook仅对开源和非盈利团队免费，而Docusaurus对所有人免费。

segments.source_content: ### Jekyll {#jekyll}

translations.zh-CN: ### Jekyll {#jekyll}

segments.source_content: [Jekyll](https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll) is one of the most mature static site generators around and has been a great tool to use — in fact, before Docusaurus, most of Facebook's Open Source websites are/were built on Jekyll! It is extremely simple to get started. We want to bring a similar developer experience as building a static site with Jekyll.

translations.zh-CN: [Jekyll](https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll)是最成熟的静态站点生成器之一——事实上在Docusaurus之前，Facebook多数开源网站都基于Jekyll构建！它入门极其简单，我们希望能延续这种类似Jekyll的开发体验。

segments.source_content: In comparison with statically generated HTML and interactivity added using `<script />` tags, Docusaurus sites are React apps. Using modern JavaScript ecosystem tooling, we hope to set new standards on doc sites' performance, asset building pipeline and optimizations, and ease to set up.

translations.zh-CN: 与使用静态生成HTML并通过`<script />`标签添加交互性的方式相比，Docusaurus站点是React应用程序。借助现代JavaScript生态工具链，我们期望为文档站点在性能表现、资源构建流程与优化、以及易用性方面树立新标杆。

segments.source_content: ## Something missing? {#something-missing}

translations.zh-CN: ## 发现遗漏？ {#something-missing}

segments.source_content: If you find issues with the documentation or have suggestions on how to improve the documentation or the project in general, please [file an issue](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus) for us, or send a tweet mentioning the [@docusaurus](https://x.com/docusaurus) X account.

translations.zh-CN: 如果您发现文档存在问题或有改进建议（无论是针对文档还是整个项目），请通过[提交issue](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus)告知我们，或在X平台发布推文时提及[@docusaurus](https://x.com/docusaurus)账号。

segments.source_content: For new feature requests, you can create a post on our [feature requests board (Canny)](/feature-requests), which is a handy tool for road-mapping and allows for sorting by upvotes, which gives the core team a better indicator of what features are in high demand, as compared to GitHub issues which are harder to triage. Refrain from making a Pull Request for new features (especially large ones) as someone might already be working on it or will be part of our roadmap. Talk to us first!

translations.zh-CN: 对于新功能请求，您可以在我们的[功能需求看板(Canny)](/feature-requests)上发帖。该看板能有效辅助路线规划，并支持按投票数排序，相比GitHub issues更便于核心团队识别高优先级需求。请注意避免直接提交大型新功能的Pull Request——可能已有其他贡献者在开发或该功能已列入路线图，请先与我们沟通！
